channel.title: Pages on Home Intelligence
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Home Intelligence

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, My name’s David, I’m a software developer. I live in a small semi-detached house just outside London in the UK. It’s a pretty average looking three-bedroom place, but underneath the average appearance I like to use technology to smarten it up. I’ve created this blog to talk about this kind of technology. Each idea that I implement is called a feature, some succeed, some fail and most end up being in a state of permanent work in progress.
